website_summaries.verdict: A terrific under desk footrest that can help you reduce fatigue and is backed by a 1-year warranty.
pros: Comes with 2 settings: a high setting for a challenging rocking motion or a low setting for a quick rocking motion
Non-slip rubber traction treads increase the footrest's stability
Comes with a ridged plate surface that creates a massaging effect on the soles of the feet
cons: More expensive than similar ergonomic footrests
Padding may be too stiff and rigid for some users

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! I wanted a foot rest under my desk but I love that this one rocks so I can release pent up energy while sitting at a desk all day. Very sturdy plastic!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: I love my new foot rest! I got it because my feet keep swelling when I’m at work. Day one no swelling. It is a better quality product than I expected...very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Flutrby

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR WORK
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect footrest for work. I have it under my desk and when i wear heels i flip it over for the lower height its amazing. I am 5'4" and this helps with my fidgety feet. It is an amazingly simply assembly. No screws or messing around comes in three pieces that took 5 seconds to put together. Definitely recommend to anyone on the search - this is amazing for the price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great for Classrooms
customer_reviews.text: Super simple in concept. I bought for my fidgety students. They're testing them out this week (since I just received 12 of them). I showed my principal and as he tried it, he became amazed as to how it made him feel. When I can save up for more, I'll purchase for the rest of my desks at school.
customer_reviews.author: hallimos

customer_reviews.title: Great for shorties
customer_reviews.text: This keeps my feet at a very comfortable position at my desk at work. I'm 5'2" and with my chair at full height my feet don't fully touch the floor. I also like that it moves so i can get the angle that's most comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Sheheartsprime

customer_reviews.title: Unexpected benefits
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty basic, but works great. My only issue is sometimes it slides forward and I have to pull it back. Unexpected benefits: I have bursitis in my ankles and since using the rocker, the swelling has gone down considerably!
customer_reviews.author: Momof3

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic junk
customer_reviews.text: Read the reviews! This is basically a cheap plastic snap together box to prop your feet. There is nothing “ergonomic” about it. Every time I put my feet on it one side falls apart. This may be the stupidest thing I have ever purchased on Amazon. I bought it because I have a new job where I am doing a long amount of time facing the screen and my hips have started hurting. I’m just not that old to have hip pain. I decided that slightly elevating my feet may help. These reviews are concerning because there is zero benefit to purchasing this. You would have the same benefit if you put 2 shoeboxes under your feet. Waste of $
customer_reviews.author: Texas Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great for better posture, comfortable support
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase! I can rest my feet on it which causes my lower back to comfortably REST against the lumbar support of my office chair. I’m convinced that office chairs were not designed for women with curves.
customer_reviews.author: JuJuBeeb

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. I should have listened to the reviews. This is absolutely trash it falls apart as soon as you put your feet on it. Thumbs down
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: This slides around
customer_reviews.text: I must be doing something wrong because this “walks” away from me slightly with each rock of my feet. This is on carpet, not hardwood which I could understand. I’ve put flexible non-skid shelf liner underneath it but it just pulls the liner along the carpet with it. I’m constantly having to tug it back into place because it’s running from me like it owes me money.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa F. Worrell

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bigger one for at work, and the smaller one from the same company for at home. The bigger one is perfect. The smaller one is fine for my women's size 11 feet, although if I had more room under my desk at home I may have rather had the bigger one there as the smaller is fairly narrow. The rubber tracks on the ends are very grippy, great you can flip it over for different heights. I already feel physically better working at my desks after just a couple days with them--really helping my overall posture. It was very easy to put together, never even looked at the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Hiker73

customer_reviews.title: Great footrest.
customer_reviews.text: great foot rest. Love that it rocks and can flip it for different height. Easy to put together. Previously had a stationary footrest but this is so nice to have & use while sitting all day at pc. Sturdier/heavier looking than looks in photo.
customer_reviews.author: SchnauzerMom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent leg support
customer_reviews.text: I must leave my chair high in order to use my computer keyboard and my legs hurt once I stand to walk because of the pressure on the back of my legs from my office chair. Once I got in the habit of putting my feet up on this support and moving my feet to keep the circulation moving in my legs I don't have leg pain now when I stand up from my desk. Excellent support and the perfect height under my desk.
customer_reviews.author: TeeTee

customer_reviews.title: If 180+lbs, look for a more sturdy solution
customer_reviews.text: The walls where the board is joined with the "feet" are too thin and may break when pressing to adjust yourself while seated. I have had to super glue it back together multiple times in two places on each side. Update: Manufacturer did contact me to ship a replacement. While I do appreciate that, it does not address the issue I have with the product itself and wish to convey to others who would like to know more about the product they are looking to buy. If you are on the lighter side, you may not have any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Commandersteve7

customer_reviews.title: not so great
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this. It was easy to put together and its perfect for under my desk at work but the side parts keep coming off when I put my feet on it and rock it back and forth and it keeps sliding forward when I rock on it . I am barley rocking on it but maybe it would be better if you didn't move it at all. Wish I would have gotten a different kind now.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Nice for sitting at desk all day
customer_reviews.text: I sit at my office desk for hours each day and this does help relieve my leg pain and keeps my legs busy. It’s a good construction but one of the pieces that holds the sides on gas already broke, making it fall off often. I do enjoy the design and shape. I was skeptical of it at first, but it’s quite nice. I never knew how much stress I put on my legs each day until I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Okay product. Does what it says, but can come apart.
customer_reviews.text: The good: keeps my feet moving while I’m getting my work done The not so good: the ends can come off when rocking away every so often. Can be frustrating. Happen 3 times now.
customer_reviews.author: Am

customer_reviews.title: Not Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it was easy to assemble and lightweight....but it very easily falls apart. VERY easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda flores

customer_reviews.title: Its pretty much perfect
customer_reviews.text: I just got a desk chair too tall for me but couldnt bring myself to replace it so I bought this. Its pretty much perfect, I can use it on flat ground or wedge it under my desk for a toe rest while stretching. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Forrest

customer_reviews.title: Great foot rest
customer_reviews.text: What can you say about a foot rest, other than it does what it is suppose to do. The plastic seems sturdy and I like that my feet can pivot back and forth. It allows my hips and knees to rest at a 90 degree angle. It has 2 heights, I am using the lower one. You can't go wrong if you are looking for an inexpensive foot rest for your home office.
customer_reviews.author: Joe F

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. It's lightweight but sturdy. I sit at a desk all day. I'm not a natural fidgeter so my legs and feet start to swell from not moving much. This encourages me to wiggle a bit while seated. I was worried it would bother my ankles rocking back and forth but so far it just feels really good to use.
customer_reviews.author: Bronte

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I like that it has two levels and that it rocks. I needed it to get my thigh a little ways off the chair because I seem to be sitting on a nerve that starts to get really irritated after sitting for a while. I have a couple of friends that have tried it and really like it. They'll be ordering soon!
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Hostetler

customer_reviews.title: Relief
customer_reviews.text: It fits under my desk well and provides that fidget factor and ability to move when you can't move. I was using an under desk elliptical, but I found it hard to work/focus and use the cycle. I still LOVE the elliptical, but I use that while watching a movie to get my steps in if I can't be outside or if get home late from work.
customer_reviews.author: Marragor

customer_reviews.title: It helps to keep circulation moving in my feet as I work for hours at my desk.
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what I was looking for. It helps to keep circulation moving in my feet as I work for hours at my desk. Was easy to assemble. I do feel like it might be slightly overpriced but there was not another product like it so there's no competition at the moment. One improvement I might suggest would be a slightly softer padding where the feet rest. Maybe something a bit more pliable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It is so difficult to sit still at a desk all day. This allows me to rock my feet and stretch as well as have correct posture. I like the fact that it is light enough to scoot around to move it if it needs to be repositioned. Also, I can rock it all day and it doesn’t make noise.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Not a very good product.
customer_reviews.text: I don't feel this will help any foot, leg or circulation issues and who remembers to rock while you're working, really!
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Sacchi

customer_reviews.title: The best footrest hands down
customer_reviews.text: Good height. Comfortable rocking motion. Easy to move around as you change positions
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Michaels

customer_reviews.title: not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This foot rest is made of plastic. My kid wanted to play and stand on the top of the foot rest. Then I heard a cracking sound and felt something was broken. It still works. But when rocking the foot rest, I can always hear noise that some broken pieces are rolling inside.
customer_reviews.author: David W.

customer_reviews.title: It takes a little getting used to!
customer_reviews.text: It really helps, as I am 5 feet tall and have trouble hitting the floor with my feet, when seated right. this way, my posture is correct and my back and feet are well supported.
customer_reviews.author: P. Thilak

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: It really doesn't need to be too sturdy unless you're looking to stand on it rather than use it as a seated foot rest. This is perfect for what I was needing it for. Low or High rocker options, very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. It's very sturdy and the treads are not going to slip. I sit at a desk all day and felt relief to lower back pressure and bad circulation as soon as I started using this.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Holt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase!  I bought one for work and one for home
customer_reviews.text: I bought one last week to use a work. This foot rest has made sitting at a desk all day at work much more comfortable! I like it so much that I bought a second one to have at home. One of my co-workers has borrowed the foot rest and loves it, too!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Francis

customer_reviews.title: Didn't stay together. Ended up throwing away.
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart. Too light for use with shoes. Rubber grip fell off. Not for tall people with foot size greater than size 9 women's shoe
customer_reviews.author: Willow

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: The stool is comfortable. I just wish it was a little higher (my desk is high for me, so my chair has to be high, but I'm only 5'5". Assembly tip: when you put the pieces together, you have to slide the piece in to lock it together. The instructional picture doesn't show that. At least not very well.
customer_reviews.author: Dee V

customer_reviews.title: does ok, not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: rocks like it should, says not to stand on it. just pushing it around with my feet under the desk, I heard it crack. but it works.
customer_reviews.author: angeljesso

customer_reviews.title: Saved my legs!
customer_reviews.text: I usually would get leg cramps during the summer when I'm off work, but not this past summer!!! I love it and the versatility it offers. Great Product! Easy to assembly and feels sturdy. Would buy again if the need arises!
customer_reviews.author: Mom, Wife, Teacher

customer_reviews.title: It's a foot rest
customer_reviews.text: Does its job. I needed something for my feet while playing games on my pc for extended periods of time. This does the trick. It also had 2 heights, just flip it over if over height is too tall etc. Probably could be used at work as well if you have a desk job.
customer_reviews.author: Danny D

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: My feet don't touch the ground in any chair. I needed something that was adjustable. You can flip this over so it's a little taller or a little shorter on the other side. Or you can even put your feet on the very tallest outside part. It's perfect for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to use at the office and product is as described. Being able to adjust heights and roll front to back to stretch the lower legs makes a huge difference in being able to sit for extended periods.
customer_reviews.author: Kim L

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME Product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This footrest is the best I have ever used, I love the rocking motion and the firmness. I sit for long period of time at work and my compute each way is 1 to 11/2 hrs so circulation is very important. I feel great after using this footrest for only a couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Herrera-Porter

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: This is great if you need something to put your feet on at your desk. Good quality and nice to use.
customer_reviews.author: Petefish Petefish

customer_reviews.title: Meets My Needs & More
customer_reviews.text: So far, I really like this footrest. It was very easy to assemble. The height is good. I can keep it still or rock it a bit to stretch out my feet. Using it I don't cross my legs, which is good for circulation and it helps my posture so I am more comfortable sitting. I still get up and walk around every 90 min. to 2 hours, but my legs and back feel so much better using this foot rest. It totally meets my needs so I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Estelle

customer_reviews.title: Falls Apart With Use
customer_reviews.text: I should have spent a few more dollars and gotten something more substantial and well-made. You should too.
customer_reviews.author: PeaceOfficer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable footrest!
customer_reviews.text: I love this footrest! Very relaxing. More so it rocks! 😊
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Yuruki

customer_reviews.title: Prevent swelling at work and good for fidgeting.
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing for keeping my legs moving at work. Wish it had resistance somehow so it was challenging to move.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Hodge

customer_reviews.title: Great little foot rocker
customer_reviews.text: I have lower back pain issues, and using this gets my hips in a position that keeps my low back in a good neutral position. It's also fun to rock on. Durable, affordable, great!
customer_reviews.author: The Red Fantastic

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I know people were raving about this, didn’t do much for me
customer_reviews.author: Aida tappan

customer_reviews.title: So much more comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my new favoreit things. Even though I lower my desk chair, I can't comfortably reach my feet to the ground. That caused a lot of slouching. This has helped me keep much better posture thought the day, and I love that it rocks and is good for a little nervous energy.
customer_reviews.author: Lisle

customer_reviews.title: Works great under desk
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use to keep moving throughout the day sitting at my desk at work. So, far, it's only been a few days, but I love it. Definitely enough room to use under a desk and quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it’s helped yet but it’s nice to have a foot rest
customer_reviews.author: Angie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Well designed and well made
customer_reviews.text: I really like this footrest. It’s a great way to keep your feet active while sitting at your desk. It’s well designed and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Linehan

customer_reviews.title: Great for under desk
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and keeps my legs elevated and mobile while working on the computer.
customer_reviews.author: marsha cannon

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together, Comfortable! I use it at work everyday & co-workers are interested in getting one too
customer_reviews.author: LindaZ

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic customer service
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic footrest. The company has exceptional customer service as well. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ChiLL

customer_reviews.title: Does What It's Supposed To
customer_reviews.text: Bought it, just quit using it... White Elephant Gift for someone.
customer_reviews.author: Phyl

customer_reviews.title: Great foot rest it has stood the test of time!
customer_reviews.text: So far this foot rest works great. I love the fact that I can rock my feet back-and-forth. The last foot rest I purchased was a piece of junk and cost way more money. This foot rest is a great stress reliever.
customer_reviews.author: Deb L0556

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Comfy. The rubber grips always come off the track though. it's a little annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Edith

customer_reviews.title: Solves feet don't reach the floor on recliner problem
customer_reviews.text: Nice for my recliner, my feet don't reach the floor
customer_reviews.author: elsie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best foot rest. I’m very happy with this product. I’ve tried other several rest which had very good reviews, but nothing like this one!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Tatis

customer_reviews.title: It works great!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together and awesome on my feet and back while I'm sitting at my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Dugan

customer_reviews.title: I use this daily at work.
customer_reviews.text: I keep this item under my desk at work. My legs feel much better after sitting for a long time. I believe I am more productive and can focus a little easier with this stim outlet.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy, and what i needed for my gaming desk
customer_reviews.author: samo

customer_reviews.title: Better than a foot rest!
customer_reviews.text: I have had circulation problems sitting at my desk all day and wanted something that more than just a foot rest- this is perfect! It is sturdy, and I really like that it can be used on both sides- high/low.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good idea but not comfortable for me.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made but the angles or geometry of the vertical rocker hoops made this uncomfortable for me. I sent it back
customer_reviews.author: GraphixJunkie

customer_reviews.title: but the quality is good, and it works great for me
customer_reviews.text: May it seem's pricey, but the quality is good, and it works great for me. Effectively improving circulation, and keeping you energetic for hours while sitting
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Find - Very Useful
customer_reviews.text: This helps keep me active and doesn’t annoy anyone as you can’t feel the constant rocking I produce for this 9 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I find it easier to sit for longer periods using this. The difference is noticeable
customer_reviews.author: Harold Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it to me
customer_reviews.text: It's already too late to return but this does not keep. The rubber grippers have smoothed off and it does not stay in place
customer_reviews.author: Vita

customer_reviews.title: The Silent Rocker!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! Doesnt make a sound while at work. (my office is carpeted. I havent tested if it’s still silent on hardwood/tile floors. hope this helps!)
customer_reviews.author: GGH_Zombiette

customer_reviews.title: works perfect
customer_reviews.text: This works just like it says. My back has been feeling much better
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well, can flip it to adjust how high ...
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well, can flip it to adjust how high you want your feet. Like that it can rock.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Excellent replacement for more traditional footrests.
customer_reviews.text: Very please with this substitute for the previous foot rest that had a platform sitting on a triangle, that was supposed to shift with my needs. The platform of the other (much more expensive device) kept falling off, and the support slid all over the carpet, so I gave up using it. This one stays where I put it and rotates as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Love this footrest
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, feels good to move my feet, appears to be durable, and the price was right. That's a home run for me.
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Can be annoying
customer_reviews.text: Constantly moves. On carpet the rubber comes off on tile the whole thing slides around
customer_reviews.author: Phlufychikk

customer_reviews.title: Rubber grip slips off. Entire side broke off after few months.
customer_reviews.text: The entire right side of the footrest shattered and broke. The plastic is thin, cheap and won't last more than a few months.
customer_reviews.author: GCP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product I thought was metal but anyway I guess a little bit expensive for almost 40$ plastic
customer_reviews.author: LastFireFox

customer_reviews.title: Great foot rest!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this item! Great for RLS, leg swelling and people who figit during long phone meetings. Not hard to put together with directions.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Campbell-Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to expectations
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Just need to get used to using it instead of shaking my leg and driving my coworkers nuts. Lol
customer_reviews.author: R. Akamichi

customer_reviews.title: ergonomic, comfortable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love this foot rest rocker, has 2 heights, use at home or for travel
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly what I needed. Easy to assemble and it has 2 heights that you get by simply flipping it over.
customer_reviews.author: down2theC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Work great under the desk to help me keep my legs moving while stuck sitting for long periods.
customer_reviews.author: Murphy

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: Way better than any of the others I have tried and seems super sturdy and comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Rebecky

customer_reviews.title: durable and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I sit for very long periods of time and this really helps me to keep my feet moving so my circulation is better than just sitting with my feet in the same position. It feels wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: meowtz

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this, in June, to use at home to keep my legs from swelling, I finally assembled it today; but it didn't work at all!!! Both of my legs were swollen and tingling. Wasn't worth the money and now It's too late to return, thanks to this 30 day return policy.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect to prop my feet upon or when I am a bit anxious, to be able to move.
customer_reviews.author: Racheal C.

product_meta.title: Ergonomic Footrest, Adjustable Under Desk Foot Rest Cushion,Compact Foot Rocker with 2 Heights for Maximum Comfort by HUANUO
